clang++  -static-libstdc++ -static-libgcc -stdlib=libc++ CMakeFiles/nvr_search.dir/nvr_search.cpp.o -o nvr_search   -L/home/dainlab/idis/r2framework/r2framework_linux/nvr_recorder/lib  -L/usr/local/ffmpeg-6.1.2/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/dainlab/idis/r2framework/r2framework_linux/nvr_recorder/lib:/usr/local/ffmpeg-6.1.2/lib:/usr/local/lib -lR2Framework /usr/local/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.87.0 /usr/local/lib/libboost_filesystem.so.1.87.0 /usr/local/lib/libboost_container.so.1.87.0 -lavformat -lavcodec -lavutil -lswscale -lswresample -lopus -lssl -lcrypto -liconv -lpthread -ldl -lx264 -ljpeg -lstdc++ /usr/local/lib/libboost_system.so.1.87.0 /usr/local/lib/libboost_atomic.so.1.87.0
